thread.section_title: Gild Hall, a Thompson Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Our Fabulous Stay
thread.title_full: Our Fabulous Stay - Review of Gild Hall, a Thompson Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jennifer O
title: Our Fabulous Stay
text: A group of us stayed at the Gild, and were blown away the moment we walked in the door. The staff was fast, friendly and courteous. The front desk was accommodating, and knowledgeable when it came to our many questions. The atmosphere was homey and the rooms spacious and comfortable. We loved our stay, and I plan on recommending Gild Hall to anyone visiting the FiDi in the future.
